description:
We're currently supporting a very exciting tech startup in their search for a Lead Data Scientist! Fully remote and within a lean, fast-paced team, this position offers exceptional benefits and the ability to lead and mentor junior data scientists.

This is an urgent hire! Our client wants to move quick but candidates must meet the below qualifications:

Must haves:
• 5+ years of hands-on data science experience
• 2+ years within Financial Services or FinTech
• Expertise in Python and SQL
• U.S. Citizen or Green Card holder

Nice to haves:
• Experience with Data Engineering and MLOps
• Advanced Degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, Mathematics, etc.

For this role, the expected base salary will be between $140,000 - $150,000. Salary will be dependent on multiple factors including experience, location, and relevance to the desired candidate's characteristics. At this time we are unable to provide visa sponsorship.
